external_references.description: Andy Greenburg 2019, June 20 Iranian Hackers Launch a New US-Targeted Campaign as Tensions Mount Retrieved. 2020/01/03
Jacqueline O'Leary et al. 2017, September 20 Insights into Iranian Cyber Espionage: APT33 Targets Aerospace and Energy Sectors and has Ties to Destructive Malware Retrieved. 2019/12/02

objects.description: [APT33](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0064) sent spear phishing emails containing links to HTML application files, which were embedded with malicious code. (Citation: Jacqueline O'Leary et al. September 2017) [APT33](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0064) has conducted targeted spear phishing campaigns against U.S. government agencies and private sector companies. (Citation: Andy Greenburg June 2019)
